trans-unit.source: Provides a type converter for <see cref="T:System.Windows.PropertyPath" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um conversor de tipo para objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.PropertyPath" />.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.PropertyPath> is used to specify type and property paths to objects involved in a binding, or for storyboard target property paths.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.PropertyPath> é usado para especificar o tipo e a propriedade caminhos para objetos envolvidos em uma associação ou de caminhos de propriedade de destino de storyboard.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.PropertyPathConverter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.PropertyPathConverter" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> que fornece um contexto de formato.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that represents the type you want to convert from.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Type" /> que representa o tipo do qual você deseja converter.

trans-unit.source: Returns whether this converter can convert an object of one type to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.PropertyPath" /> type.
trans-unit.target: Retorna se este conversor pode converter um objeto de um tipo para o tipo <see cref="T:System.Windows.PropertyPath" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="sourceType" /> is type <see cref="T:System.String" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <paramref name="sourceType" /> for do tipo <see cref="T:System.String" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> que fornece um contexto de formato.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that represents the type you want to convert to.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Type" /> que representa o tipo para o qual você deseja converter.

trans-unit.source: Returns whether this converter can convert the object to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.PropertyPath" /> type.
trans-unit.target: Retorna se esse conversor pode converter o objeto para o tipo <see cref="T:System.Windows.PropertyPath" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="destinationType" /> is type <see cref="T:System.String" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <paramref name="destinationType" /> for do tipo <see cref="T:System.String" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> que fornece um contexto de formato.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> to use as the current culture.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> a ser usado como a cultura atual.

trans-unit.source: The object to convert to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.PropertyPath" />.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a ser convertido em um <see cref="T:System.Windows.PropertyPath" />.

trans-unit.source: This is expected to be a string.
trans-unit.target: É esperado que isso seja uma cadeia de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified value to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.PropertyPath" /> type.
trans-unit.target: Converte o valor especificado no tipo <see cref="T:System.Windows.PropertyPath" />.

trans-unit.source: The converted <see cref="T:System.Windows.PropertyPath" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.PropertyPath" /> convertido.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="source" /> was provided as <see langword="null." />
trans-unit.target: O <paramref name="source" /> foi fornecido como <see langword="null." />

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="source" /> was not <see langword="null" />, but was not of the expected <see cref="T:System.String" /> type.
trans-unit.target: O <paramref name="source" /> não era <see langword="null" />, mas não era do tipo <see cref="T:System.String" /> esperado.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> que fornece um contexto de formato.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> to use as the current culture.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> a ser usado como a cultura atual.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.PropertyPath" /> to convert.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.PropertyPath" /> a ser convertido.

trans-unit.source: The destination type.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de destino.

trans-unit.source: This is expected to be the <see cref="T:System.String" /> type.
trans-unit.target: É esperado que isso seja do tipo <see cref="T:System.String" />.

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified value object to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.PropertyPath" /> type.
trans-unit.target: Converte o objeto de valor especificado no tipo <see cref="T:System.Windows.PropertyPath" />.

trans-unit.source: The converted destination <see cref="T:System.String" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.String" /> de destino convertido.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="value" /> was provided as <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O <paramref name="value" /> foi fornecido como <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="value" /> was not <see langword="null" />, but was not of the expected <see cref="T:System.Windows.PropertyPath" /> type.
trans-unit.target: O <paramref name="value" /> não era <see langword="null" />, mas não era do tipo <see cref="T:System.Windows.PropertyPath" /> esperado.

trans-unit.source: \- or -
trans-unit.target: \- ou -

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="destinationType" /> was not the <see cref="T:System.String" /> type.
trans-unit.target: O <paramref name="destinationType" /> não era do tipo <see cref="T:System.String" />.
